hero.title: Comfort and Dignity
hero.description: Providing compassionate hospice care that honors life's journey with professional medical support, emotional guidance, and unwavering dignity for patients and families.

services.title: Comprehensive Care
services.description: Our interdisciplinary team provides personalized care plans designed to enhance comfort, manage symptoms, and support both patients and families throughout their journey.

comfort.title: Comfort Care
comfort.description: Comprehensive pain and symptom management focused on quality of life and dignity.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Round-the-clock medical support and emergency care available whenever needed.

family.title: Family Support
family.description: Emotional and spiritual support for both patients and their loved ones throughout the journey.

equipment.title: Medical Equipment
equipment.description: All necessary medical equipment and supplies provided and maintained in your home.

about.title: Dedicated to
about.description: For over 15 years, IE Community Hospice has been providing exceptional end-of-life care with a focus on comfort, dignity, and family support. Our team of licensed healthcare professionals is committed to ensuring that every patient receives personalized care in the comfort of their own home.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: The compassionate care provided to my mother during her final months was extraordinary. The team made a difficult time bearable with their kindness and professionalism.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.content: I cannot express enough gratitude for the 24/7 support and comfort care. They treated my father with dignity and respect, making his final days peaceful.

items.name: Emily Rodriguez
items.content: The entire family felt supported throughout this journey. Their expertise in pain management and emotional support was invaluable during our most difficult time.

contact.title: We're Here to Help
contact.description: Reach out to our compassionate team for immediate support, questions about our services, or to schedule a consultation.

form.title: Send us a message
form.messagePlaceholder: How can we help you today?

emergency.title: Emergency Support
emergency.description: For immediate medical emergencies, call 911. For urgent hospice-related concerns:

footer.description: Providing compassionate hospice care with dignity, comfort, and professional excellence for over 15 years.
